page.title: 14HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: {Housing Estate;}The houses are{private with a variety of{detached}and{semi_ {detached}and{bungalows.}Most of the gardens are{open plan}but many have built small garden wall.There is a {playing area}in this section of the estate with a{climbing frame}and a couple of fields for children to play on.{The Grange,}which now belongs to {Priest Furnaces}is situated on the edge of the estate. {The California Workshops}used to be used for the{iron ore miners.}The building is made of{handcut sandstone with the{herringbone pattern}on it. The tiles on one of the buillding are {pantile.}These buildings used to store the{iron ore}and{pit ponies.}Some of the miners used to sleep on the top floor of these buildings.A{subway}at the edge of the estate runs under the {Parkway(A174).
